TunableList.name: AWARENESS_CHANNEL_DATA
TunableList.description: Define data specific to the tuned awareness channels. If no data is specified, default values are used.

TunableTuple.name: value
TunableTuple.description: Define how each awareness channel is supposed to behave.

TunableEnum.name: evaluation_type
TunableEnum.description: Define how Sims evaluate scores for this channel.

Tunable.name: limit
Tunable.description: Define a limit beyond which scores are no longer added. For example, imagine a SMELL channel evaluated using SUM (to make Sims aware of new smells, for instance). It would be unrealistic for the nth plate of food (where n is large) to produce a reaction. Use limit to define this characteristic.
